store_info.name: Needle & Groove Records
store_info.description: An independent record store specializing in alternative, rock, and rare vinyl finds.

albums.name: The Downward Spiral
albums.description: A dark, industrial concept album that explores themes of self-destruction, despair, and transformation.

albums.name: White Pony
albums.description: A genre-bending album blending heavy alt-metal with atmospheric and experimental sounds.

albums.name: Temple of the Dog
albums.description: A grunge supergroup’s heartfelt tribute to Andrew Wood, filled with raw emotion and soaring vocals.

albums.name: OK Computer
albums.description: A landmark alternative rock album exploring themes of technology, alienation, and modern life.

albums.name: Dirt
albums.description: A gritty, heavy grunge album that dives into themes of addiction and despair with haunting melodies.

albums.name: Mezzanine
albums.description: A trip-hop masterpiece with moody atmospheres, layered textures, and unforgettable grooves.

albums.name: Loveless
albums.description: An iconic shoegaze album defined by swirling guitars, hazy textures, and dreamlike vocals.

albums.name: In Utero
albums.description: Raw and abrasive, Nirvana’s final studio album delivers an unflinching and emotional statement.
